job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Mada is a startup powering inspired shopping experiences. Our A.I.-based marketplace app, The Mada App, uses proprietary technology to recommend personalized and shoppable outfits for each user. Dubbed “Tinder for Outfits,” the app curates millions of products from thousands of brands and retailers, like Bloomingdale's, Shopbop, Urban Outfitters, and more, to revolutionize the way Gen Z shops. Now, we are working with some of the world’s largest brands on a new venture, and are looking for an uber-talented data scientist to join our team to help us push the boundaries of what’s possible for product recommendation.Major responsibilities include:Build and deploy ML models and applications in the cloudMaintain and improve existing ML models and applicationsDiagnosing and resolving bugs and issues promptlyCreate ETL pipelines to/from various types of data structuresResearch and validate new approaches to ML for use within our apps and interfacesInterface closely with our product, tech and other teamsCreate project plans for and estimate level of effort for ML initiativesParticipate in full group project planning and sales engineering meetingsAutomate analytics and business
